definition: ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
money/wealth/riches/property/valuables
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
jewel/gem/treasure/precious
variant of 寶|宝[bao3]

sentences.english: We all hope that this year can wealth.
sentences.chinese: 大家都希望今年能够吉祥如意，招财进宝。

sentences.english: Everyone hopes this year to luck and a thriving business.
sentences.chinese: 大家都希望今年能够吉祥如意，招财进宝。

sentences.english: Yi could also prove a nice recruiting tool.
sentences.chinese: 易建联还将证明他是个招财进宝的好手。

sentences.english: The feeling of wealth produces wealth.
sentences.chinese: 对富裕的喜爱感将会招财进宝。

sentences.english: Since the shape of the dumplings resembles a gold ingot, eating them symbolizes the gaining of wealth.
sentences.chinese: 由于水饺貌似元宝，食用饺子象征招财进宝。

definition: lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
god of wealth
lit. gold and jade fill the hall (idiom)/fig. abundant wealth/abundance of knowledge
lucky/auspicious/propitious
god of wealth/very wealthy man
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
to climb step by step/to rise steadily/on the up and up
mythical animal that brings luck and wards off evil, having head of a dragon and lion's body, often with hoofs, wings and tail/also written 辟邪/fig. valiant soldier
treasure bowl (mythology)/fig. source of wealth/cornucopia/gold mine
moral (of a story)/lesson to be learned/implication/message/import/metaphorical meaning
to make money
riches and honor
